name: BOTs (itch) (Clorinthe, phamthuyngan)
description:
Description

Try to run away from this robot factory !

This game was created during the Interface3 "Game developer" training.

Controls
  • Use Z, Q, S & D or the directional arrows to control your BOT.
  • Use the left click to fire !
Gameplay:

Ngân Pickery

https://itch.io/profile/phamthuyngan

Graphics:

Clorinthe

https://clorinthe.itch.io/

Music:

"Getting it Done" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
